participant_1.background:
I am a 25 year old male who is concerned about his health and weight.
i hate winter.
I'm struggling with school but I'm happy with my family.
My collection of movie tickets reminds me of my favorite films.
I love to knit to relieve stress and keep my hands busy.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy relaxing in my free time by watching cartoons.
I like to do things that take my mind off the past.
I try to go for a walk every day, but it can be difficult because I can't see well.
my favorite hobby is reading suspense novels.
I've been secretly watching baseball games all year, even though my parents don't like it.

content.text: What's up?
Not much just watching some cartoons. What are you doing?
I'm just sitting here knitting. It helps me to relieve stress.
That's cool. I've never tried knitting before.
You should try it! It's really relaxing.
Maybe I will. I'm always looking for new ways to relax.
What are some of your favorite hobbies?
I like to read suspense novels. They help me to take my mind off of the past.
I love reading too! I just finished reading a book about a serial killer. It was really suspenseful.
Oh that sounds really interesting. I'll have to check it out.
You should. It's a really good book.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What are some other things you like to do?
I like to go for walks, but it's hard for me because I can't see very well.
That's too bad. Maybe you could get a guide dog?
I've thought about it, but I'm not sure if I'm ready for that yet.
I understand. It's a big decision.
Yeah, it is.
Well, I'm glad you're finding ways to relax.
Thanks. I'm glad I met you too. You seem really nice.
Thank you. You seem nice too.
Well, I'm going to go watch some more cartoons. It was nice talking to you.
You too. Have a nice day!
You too!
